sentences.sContent: ...material likely to deprave or corrupt those who see it.
sentences.sCn: ...可能会使那些看到的人堕落或腐败的东西。

remMethod.val: de(向下) + prav(弯曲的) + e → 使弯曲 → 使堕落

words.tran: 使腐化（deprave的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to be an evil influence on someone, especially someone who is young or not very experienced
